Articles.Content:
True.

The next user hates the Imperial system with a passion.

True. I hate that which i don't know. (No idea what you mean )

The user below me has a save with a craft currently in Interplanetary orbit.

False. (and I was referring to the system of measurement originally made popular by the British Empire and frequently used here in the USA. The one with all those funny feet, pounds, inches, yards, gallons, teaspoons, and miles)

The next user has a realistic location displayed.

True. (Also, my signature is for the players who hate mods and think they're much better than everyone else because they don't use mods.)

User below me hates part purists.

Edited May 13, 2013 by Flixxbeatz

False, sniped

The user below is tired from being on the forums all evening.

False, I just got on and it's afternoon here.

The next user lives in a place where it is afternoon right now.

False. It's midnight here.

User below me lives in Pluto.

False, i live on Wolf359.

Pretty good internet considering how far away the nearest server is.

The user below me Has a signature with a picture in it.
False. THe user below me likes cats.

Well... I'm not sure...

The next user has a Google account.

True.

The user below me has a brother and/or a sister.

False.

The user below me has either watched Hayate no Gotoku/Hayate the Combat Butler or read the manga version.

True!

Person below me likes using ion engines despite their insanely low thrust.

False. I have never used them.

The user below me is playing the Count to 50 forum game.

O.o how'd you know!?!?

The user bellow me has traveled so far away from Kerbol that its just a dot in the sky

True.

The user below me is wearing headphones.

Only when I'm listening to music while playing ksp

The user below me has had a piece of debris hit a space station with tons of pieces, which breaks it apart into each individual piece, creating a giant debris ring around kerbin

False.

The user below me misses the now locked Count to 50 thread.

True, what will I do now?

The user below agrees with me.

True.

The user below me has no idea what to do now to replace that thread.

True.

The user below wants the thread replaced

False.

The user below eats food.

What is this real life you speak of?

The user below me has gotten close enough to Kerbol to experience the lower time warps (you can't put time warp to max)

True, I've orbited at about 200km

The user below me has a pain in their lower back

True, quite often :c

The user below me has looked directly into the sun without any apparent ill effects
